alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Mountains Of San Benito County And Interior Monterey County Including Pinnacles National Monument; Northern Monterey Bay; Northern Salinas Valley, Hollister Valley and Carmel Valley; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains; Santa Lucia Mountains and Los Padres National Forest; Southern Monterey Bay and Big Sur Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 3:29PM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Santa Cruz, northwestern San Benito, southeastern Santa Clara and northwestern Monterey Counties through 415 PM PST... At 328 PM PST, the public reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hollister to 7 miles west of Del Monte Forest. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salinas, Watsonville, Gilroy, Hollister, Seaside, Monterey, Marina, Pacific Grove, Carmel-By-The-Sea, Carmel Valley Village, Prunedale, Ridgemark, Castroville, Spreckels, Moss Landing, Del Monte Forest, Boronda, Interlaken, San Juan Bautista and Del Rey Oaks. This includes Highway 1 between Mile Markers 72 and 75. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
